arts.ttl: Derby County survival hopes rocked by quadruple injury blow as striker undergoes surgery
arts.sum: Derby County have been rocked by the news that Lars-Jorgen Salvesen is out for the season after picking up a knee injury in training. Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone.

arts.ttl: John Eustace in 'electric' Derby County admission but suffers four new injuries
arts.sum: Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone. "We've had two or three different teams throughout the week and the four big injuries we've had, and the way the lads went about their business today, was something I was very proud of.

arts.ttl: Derby County finally turn up as 'blueprint' message sent after Blackburn surprise
arts.sum: Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone. Derby had to survive seven minutes of stoppage time but they clung on for a victory that takes them off the bottom of the table and leaves them just four points from safety.

arts.ttl: Valerien Ismael explains Blackburn Rovers theory behind terrible Derby start
arts.sum: Blackburn Rovers conceded twice in seven minutes and never recovered at Pride Park

arts.ttl: John Eustace reacts to Blackburn Rovers 'snakes' and verdict on Derby fallout
arts.sum: The former head coach spoke glowingly about his time at Ewood Park

arts.ttl: Blackburn Rovers follow their own narrative to hand John Eustace first Derby win
arts.sum: Two goals in the first seven minutes helped the Rams beat Rovers 2-1 at Pride Park

arts.ttl: Blackburn Rovers player ratings with four 4/10s after poor Derby display
arts.sum: Blackburn Rovers were beaten 2-1 by Derby County at Pride Park

arts.ttl: Derby County player ratings v Blackburn as quartet score high as Pride Park erupts with win - Leigh Curtis
arts.sum: Before Blackburn had chance to regain their senses, Derby were further ahead when Marcus Harness pulled a cross back from the byline that the visitors could not deal with leading to Jerry Yates grabbing an assist as Ebou Adams added a second. Eustace, who left Rovers last month to take charge at Pride Park, watched as Derby raced out of the blocks and they were ahead early on when a free-kick into the box was flicked on by Nat Phillips that caused chaos inside the area.

arts.ttl: John Eustace enjoys win over former club as Derby beat Blackburn
arts.sum: Craig Forsyth and Ebou Adams scored in the first seven minutes and County held on to win 2-1.

arts.ttl: John Eustace in triple Derby County change as he names team to face Blackburn Rovers
arts.sum: Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone. Derby: Zetterstrom, Wilson, Langas, Phillips, Forsyth, Elder; Adams, Thompson, Armstrong; Harness and Yates.
